text: This is a list of PlayStation 5 games, which is scheduled for release in North America, Oceania, Japan, and South Korea on November 12, 2020, and the rest of the world on November 19, 2020. This list also includes cross-generation games that will be released natively with enhanced versions optimized for PlayStation 5. The PlayStation 5 will also be backwards compatible with a majority of PlayStation 4 games.
